remarks: The sign value.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 9-Sep-2018.)
statement:
sgnsval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
sgnsval.0 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
sgnsval.l $e |- .< = ( lt ` R ) $.
sgnsval.s $e |- S = ( sgns ` R ) $.
sgnsval $p |- ( ( R e. V /\ X e. B ) -> ( S ` X ) = if ( X = .0. , 0 , if ( .0. .< X , 1 , -u 1 ) ) ) $.
